title: "Shame On Them": Netanyahu As Macron Calls For Halt On Arms Deliveries
content: "I think that today, the priority is that we return to a political solution, that we stop delivering weapons to fight in Gaza," Emmanuel Macron told French broadcaster France Inter.
summary: "I think that today, the priority is that we return to a political solution, that we stop delivering weapons to fight in Gaza," Emmanuel Macron told French broadcaster France Inter.

title: End "Shocking Violence", Says UN Chief On Hamas Attack Anniversary
content: The UN secretary-general denounced Hamas and called for an immediate end to the "shocking violence and bloodshed" in Gaza and Lebanon in a statement Saturday ahead of the anniversary of the Palestinian group's October 7 attack.
summary: The UN secretary-general denounced Hamas and called for an immediate end to the "shocking violence and bloodshed" in Gaza and Lebanon in a statement Saturday ahead of the anniversary of the Palestinian group's October 7 attack.

title: "If Donald Trump Doesn't Win....": Elon Musk Joins Ex US President On Stage
content: Donald Trump was shot in the ear when he was addressing a rally in Pennsylvania's Butler on July 13.
summary: Donald Trump was shot in the ear when he was addressing a rally in Pennsylvania's Butler on July 13.

title: Thousands March For Ceasefire Ahead Of Israel-Hamas War Anniversary
content: Thousands of protesters marched in cities around the world on Saturday calling for a ceasefire in Gaza and Lebanon as the war in the Palestinian territory neared the one-year mark.
summary: Thousands of protesters marched in cities around the world on Saturday calling for a ceasefire in Gaza and Lebanon as the war in the Palestinian territory neared the one-year mark.

title: Highly-Skilled Chinese Hackers Infiltrated Multiple US Telecom Firms
content: A group of highly skilled Chinese hackers linked to the Chinese government successfully infiltrated multiple US telecommunications firms in the last few months, CNN reported.
summary: A group of highly skilled Chinese hackers linked to the Chinese government successfully infiltrated multiple US telecommunications firms in the last few months, CNN reported.

title: A Year Of Devastation: Israel On Alert Ahead Of Hamas Attack Anniversary
content: Israel placed its forces on alert Saturday ahead of the anniversary of Hamas's October 7 attack, after a military official said the country was preparing its retaliation for Iran's missile attack.
summary: Israel placed its forces on alert Saturday ahead of the anniversary of Hamas's October 7 attack, after a military official said the country was preparing its retaliation for Iran's missile attack.

title: Iran Threatens Of "Even Stronger" Retaliation To Any Israeli Attack
content: Tehran's top diplomat in Damascus on Saturday threatened an "even stronger" reaction to any aggression, as Israel readied its response to an Iranian missile attack earlier this week.
summary: Tehran's top diplomat in Damascus on Saturday threatened an "even stronger" reaction to any aggression, as Israel readied its response to an Iranian missile attack earlier this week.

title: This City Has Been Voted World's Best, Per Readers' Choice Awards 2024
content: Sydney has been named the world's best city in a survey conducted by Conde Nast Traveller. The top-10 global cities rankings are part of the publication's annual Readers' Choice Awards for 2024, which launched on October 1 in the UK.
summary: Sydney has been named the world's best city in a survey conducted by Conde Nast Traveller. The top-10 global cities rankings are part of the publication's annual Readers' Choice Awards for 2024, which launched on October 1 in the UK.

title: Greta Thunberg Detained In Brussels For Blocking Road During Protest
content: Climate activist Greta Thunberg was among dozens of protesters detained Saturday for blocking a road in the Belgian capital at a demonstration against fossil fuel subsidies.
summary: Climate activist Greta Thunberg was among dozens of protesters detained Saturday for blocking a road in the Belgian capital at a demonstration against fossil fuel subsidies.

title: Hezbollah Heir Apparent Out Of Contact After Israeli Air Strikes: Report
content: The potential successor to slain Hezbollah leader Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah has been out of contact since Friday, a Lebanese security source said on Saturday, after an Israeli airstrike that is reported to have targeted him.
summary: The potential successor to slain Hezbollah leader Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah has been out of contact since Friday, a Lebanese security source said on Saturday, after an Israeli airstrike that is reported to have targeted him.

title: "Beginning Of Communication...": S Jaishankar On PM's Putin, Zelensky Meets
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi's meetings with the top leaders of Russia and Ukraine were "beginnings of a communication process" between two countries engaged in a serious conflict.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi's meetings with the top leaders of Russia and Ukraine were "beginnings of a communication process" between two countries engaged in a serious conflict.

title: Climate Protesters Pretend To Drown Themselves In Oil In London
content: Ocean Rebellion campaigners recently pretended to drown themselves in oil and gas in a protest outside a United Nations agency in London.
summary: Ocean Rebellion campaigners recently pretended to drown themselves in oil and gas in a protest outside a United Nations agency in London.

title: Emirates Bans Pagers, Walkie-Talkies Onboard Flights After Lebanon Blasts
content: Dubai's Emirates Airlines has banned passengers from carrying pagers and walkie-talkies on its flights, following last month's attacks on Lebanese group Hezbollah involving communication devices that exploded.
summary: Dubai's Emirates Airlines has banned passengers from carrying pagers and walkie-talkies on its flights, following last month's attacks on Lebanese group Hezbollah involving communication devices that exploded.

title: US Couple Takes Dozens Of Trips After Stealing Rs 4 Crore From Government
content: A couple in the United States defrauded the government of nearly $500,000 (approximately Rs 4.2 Crore) to take dozens of lavish vacations to Walt Disney World while claiming they were travelling for work.
summary: A couple in the United States defrauded the government of nearly $500,000 (approximately Rs 4.2 Crore) to take dozens of lavish vacations to Walt Disney World while claiming they were travelling for work.

title: Pak Capital Locked Down As Imran Khan's Supporters Try To Seize The Streets
content: Pakistan's capital was locked down on Saturday, swarmed by security forces with mobile internet cut as supporters of jailed ex-prime minister Imran Khan attempted to seize the streets in protest.
summary: Pakistan's capital was locked down on Saturday, swarmed by security forces with mobile internet cut as supporters of jailed ex-prime minister Imran Khan attempted to seize the streets in protest.

title: US Officials Struggle To Quash Hurricane Helene Conspiracy Theories
content: In the wake of the devastation of Hurricane Helene in the United States this week, a new storm emerged on social media - false rumours about how disaster funds have been used, and even claims that officials control the weather.
summary: In the wake of the devastation of Hurricane Helene in the United States this week, a new storm emerged on social media - false rumours about how disaster funds have been used, and even claims that officials control the weather.

title: Young Female Soldiers In Israel Raise Alarms About Security Risks On Border
content: Despite the ongoing military campaign against Hezbollah, the observers assert that they continue to be sidelined. Many believe this is partly due to an ingrained culture of misogyny within the IDF.
summary: Despite the ongoing military campaign against Hezbollah, the observers assert that they continue to be sidelined. Many believe this is partly due to an ingrained culture of misogyny within the IDF.

title: Has JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon Endorsed Donald Trump? What He Said
content: Donald Trump on Friday promoted an endorsement from JPMorgan Chief Executive Jamie Dimon.
summary: Donald Trump on Friday promoted an endorsement from JPMorgan Chief Executive Jamie Dimon.

title: 1.3 Lakh Lavender Plants Adorn "Starry Night" Themed Bosnian Park
content: A Vincent Van Gogh aficionado in Bosnia has turned a plot of land into a giant, living reproduction of the painter's masterpiece, "Starry Night", composed of thousands of plants.
summary: A Vincent Van Gogh aficionado in Bosnia has turned a plot of land into a giant, living reproduction of the painter's masterpiece, "Starry Night", composed of thousands of plants.

title: Will Israel Hit Iran's Nuclear Facilities? What Top US Official Said
content: It is "really hard to tell" if Israel will use the anniversary of Hamas' October 7 attacks to retaliate, a top US State Department official told CNN on Friday.
summary: It is "really hard to tell" if Israel will use the anniversary of Hamas' October 7 attacks to retaliate, a top US State Department official told CNN on Friday.
